trans-unit.source: Controls whether channels listen synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 채널의 수신 대기가 동기적인 또는 비동기적인지를 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.SynchronousReceiveBehavior"></xref> class.

See <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection%29> for a description of the interface member that this class implements.
trans-unit.target: 참조 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection%29>에 대 한 설명은이 클래스가 구현 하는 인터페이스 멤버.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection%29>

trans-unit.source: The objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩 요소가 동작을 지원 해야 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> for a description of the interface member this class implements.
trans-unit.target: 참조 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>이 클래스가 구현 하는 인터페이스 멤버에 대 한 설명을.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that is to be customized.
The client runtime to be customized.
Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.ReceiveSynchronously*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Throws an exception if the `endpointDispatcher` is `null`.
The endpoint that exposes the contract.
The endpoint dispatcher to be modified or extended.
See <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> for a description of the interface member this class implements.
trans-unit.target: 참조 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>이 클래스가 구현 하는 인터페이스 멤버에 대 한 설명을.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>
